today_in_history_posts.title: BIP Proposal: Wallet Labels Export Format
today_in_history_posts.summary:
- The proposed BIP aims to standardize wallet label export and import via CSV format.
- It suggests a two-column CSV for transaction references and labels, supporting .csv and .zip files.
- Feedback is welcomed on the format, lacking a reference implementation as of now.

today_in_history_posts.title: Fee Ratecards (your gateway to negativity)
today_in_history_posts.summary:
- The Lightning Network introduces ratecards for dynamic fee adjustments based on channel capacity.
- Ratecards enable negative fee implementation and variable pricing for liquidity, improving pricing precision.
- Additionally, a Bitcoin meetup presentation highlighted cryptocurrency's evolution, privacy concerns, and decentralization importance.

today_in_history_posts.title: Deflationary money is a Good Thing
today_in_history_posts.summary:
- Investment strategies are divided into passive and active types, with distinctive involvement levels.
- Passive investing issues include principal/agent misalignment and underutilization of assets.
- The article explores deflationary currencies and proposes a mixed economic approach using Bitcoin.
